featured.text: At approximately the same time, the Earl of Sandwich popularized a new way of eating bread—in thin slices, with something (e.g., jam or cucumbers) between them.
I was held up by a traffic jam on the freeway for about an hour.

definition.en_def: A sweet spread made from fruit and sugar, or a situation where a lot of people or things are crowded together.
definition.example: I like to spread strawberry jam on my toast for breakfast.
